<div x-data="dropdown">
  <button x-bind="trigger" class="px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium text-gray-100 bg-violet-500 dark:bg-violet-500 hover:bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-violet-600 border-violet-700 focus:ring-violet-200 block mx-auto">Dropdown menu</button>
  <div
    x-bind="menu"
    x-cloak
    x-alt-transition="{
          enter: ['opacity-0 scale-y-[0.5]', 'transition ease-out duration-100 origin-top', 'opacity-100'],
          leave: ['opacity-100', 'transition ease-in duration-100 origin-top', 'opacity-0 scale-y-[0.5]'],
        }"
    class="z-20 shadow-md rounded-md"
  >
    <div
      class="w-[320px] rounded-md border border-gray-200 bg-white shadow-md dark:border-neutral-700 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300"
    >
      <ul>
        <li>
          <a href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
            button
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
            button
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
            button
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
            button
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">

            button
          </a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The data for the component is provided by the dropdown function in the x-data directive. This function takes two object arguments: the props and floatingUI options.

dropdown({
    triggerEv: String,
    autoClose: Boolean,
},
{
    placement: String,
    offsetX: Number,
    offsetY: Number,
    flip: Boolean,
    autoPlacement: Boolean,
    inline: Boolean,
})
triggerEv
click String

Event that triggers dropdown. Valid values are click or hover.

autoClose
true Boolean

If true menu is closed after click on any element inside.

placement
bottom-start String

Initial placement of dropdown content. See floatingUI documentation for valid values.

offsetX
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element.

offsetY
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element.

flip
false Boolean

Allows fliping of the dropdown to the opposite placement if outside of current view.

autoPlacement
false Boolean

Automatically calculates best placement for the floating element.

inline
false Boolean
